title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           Appomattox Court House National Historical Park 239 George Peers Drive  Appomattox, VA 24522                 Directions         Appomattox Court House NHP is located 3 miles east of U.S. Highway 460, and 3 miles east of the modern town of Appomattox, Virginia along Rt. 24.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Appomattox Court House National Historical Park The park is open all year, seven days a week.  It is only closed for Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Years.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Monday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Thursday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Saturday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM             Weather           The park may close due to emergency weather conditions (typically snow or ice).  For updated information about possible closure or altered hours due to weather, please call 434-352-8987 ext. 245.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Entrance Fee - $10.00 There is a fee to enter the park, but there are no additional fees once you are in the park.  Vehicles are $10 each ($5 for motorcycles).  National Park passes are accepted and can be purchased in the park.         Visitor Centers                   Living History is an important part to a summer visit to the park. NPS        For specifics on operating hours, fees, and conditions, please choose from the categories on the left. Know that pets must be on a leash and picnic tables are now available.  Be advised that as of Jan. 2, 2016 the park is open from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.
